name: Burj Khalifa (Dubai) - Simplified Model
description: World's tallest building (828 m); focus on core shear wall + mega-columns; vertical behavior
reference_sources: Ali & Moon 2007: Tall Building Structural Systems and Aerodynamic Form (JSCEJ)
Public architectural drawings and concept documents
expected_outputs: Max drift under code wind: <H/500 (target accuracy ±5%)
Core shear force distribution (compare distribution shape)
notes: Full FEA model proprietary; use published modal data and code-based wind response as reference
